trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Corvallis
There were no other sightings in Corvallis on or around October 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting Detailswent out side to take a piss sky was clear . my door opens to the north and shining in the sky was what i first thought to be a airplane cause i heard airplane noise but then i spotted the airplane and it went quickly out of view ,so next i thought it was a sat lite so i lined my self up with a tree to give my self a perspective on how fast and witch way it was moving , it does not seem to move per say it kind of makes you think of movement the way it pulses and changes shape but it staid in same place for half hour . i thought i saw something fly up to meet it and got creeped out now im inside.my roomate just got up for water i took him out side he spotted on exactly the same elevation due south the one to the south started spinning in small circles the one to the north dropped down to 15 degrees then accended back to 30 degrees . we are creeped out and locking the door.
